status.autoStartBackendHint: Automatically start the backend when the desktop app opens (works for both manual launch and autostart)

welcome.title: Setup Guide
welcome.subtitle: Follow these steps to initialize OpenAkita. Each step guides you through key configurations.

welcome.step2: Prepare the Python environment (built-in or system)
welcome.step3: Create venv and install the openakita package
welcome.step4: Add LLM providers, fetch model lists, and configure endpoints
welcome.step5: IM channels, tools & skills, Agent system, and other advanced settings

agreement.title: Risk Acknowledgment
agreement.subtitle: Please read the following carefully before proceeding
agreement.content:
OpenAkita is an AI Agent software powered by Large Language Models (LLMs). Before using it, you need to understand and accept the following:

1. Behavior Is Not Fully Predictable
The AI Agent's behavior is driven by underlying LLMs, which produce probabilistic and non-deterministic outputs. Even with identical inputs, the Agent may produce different results, including but not limited to: unexpected file operations, unintended messages, and unintended tool invocations.

2. Supervision Is Required
You are responsible for supervising the AI Agent's actions at all times. For tool calls that require approval (such as file deletion, system command execution, message sending, etc.), review the operation details carefully before approving. It is strongly recommended NOT to enable auto-confirm mode without active supervision.

3. Potential Risks
The AI Agent may cause: data loss or corruption (e.g., accidental file deletion, overwriting important data), sending inappropriate messages (e.g., incorrect content through IM channels), executing dangerous system commands, generating unexpected API calls and costs, and other unforeseen side effects.

4. Disclaimer of Liability
OpenAkita is an open-source software project provided "AS IS" without warranty of any kind, express or implied. The project maintainers and contributors shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from the use of this software. You assume all risks associated with using this software.

5. Data Security
Your conversation content, configuration data, and tool call records may be sent to third-party LLM service providers. Do not share sensitive personal information, passwords, keys, or other confidential data in conversations unless you fully understand and accept the associated risks.
agreement.confirmLabel: Type "I ACKNOWLEDGE" below to confirm you have read and understood the above:
agreement.errorMismatch: Input does not match. Please type "I ACKNOWLEDGE" exactly.
